title: Alpha Client - Champ Select - Slow/Lag
body:
i upgraded to the alpha client yesterday, and every time i go into champ select (so far 3v3 flex ranked) I get extreme lag/slowness. Animations are choppy, hovering over rune pages take a few sec to show what the stats are, and trying to change masteries (actually on the page, takes forever to the point where i get nervous it won't be able to change it in time, what took 4 - 5 sec at most in the old client, can take as much as 20 - 60 sec in the new one. 

In addition, locking in a champion is super delays, where I've gotten nervous that it won't actually lock because it delays 3 - 8 sec. 

Is any one else having this issue? is there a fix? is this a known issue getting patched?

Thanks,
KingArtemis {{champion:26}}

replies.body:
It seems to be extremely slow in general, so slow to the point where I was in queue for a game and I failed to accept the match before it even popped up. There's too much animations or something, and I can't use it very efficiently.
{{item:3073}}

ya, i was wondering if the animations were some how beyond what my computer can handle, but the fact that i can play the game just fine, kind of makes it confusing, since i can't imagine the few animations in champ select and such, can be anywhere near the complexity going on in a 5 v5 fight. {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Guys, i installed the client today and it runs smooth on basically everything while i'm navigating trough the client, sometimes i got 1s delay or so but it isn't a big deal.

Now, my BIGGEST problem (complain?) about this new client it is indeed the champion select, it's so so so but so laggy that i had to launch the legacy client because i couldn't anymore deal with it, i've made 6 games, on 4 of them i almost failed to ban and to pick, and i couldn't even chat or ban the champion that my team mate asked for so i had to ban whatever was the most "op" in my sight, now on the other 2 games i couldn't even lock in my champion because the game froze, the result ? Yeah, got 5 min penalty for dodging and on the next one i got 15 min all of this for no responsability of my own, the game just got stuck. 

I think you guys should have at least fixed this major issue before opening the beta world wide because this is huge, i know it's a beta but still at least you could give the players free dodges on the new client because people is getting punished for no fault of their own. But don't get me wrong, the new client is marvelous, looks beautifull but is missing like small simple features, but anyway, just fix that champ select which right now is the most important thing, so i'm sorry guys, i'm going back right now to the old client {{champion:32}}  until you guys fix it. 

Good luck on that, on the rest ? Good job !
